body: When you charge with an ally, you are more deadly.
name: Horde Charge
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Horde Charge

sections.body: Base attack bonus +1, half-orc or orc.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When charging during the same round as an ally with this feat, you gain a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls in addition to the normal bonus for charging. If you can make multiple attacks on a charge, this bonus only applies to the first attack.
sections.name: Benefit
